articles.title: T.B Joshua: Disquiet as Adeboye, Oyedepo, Kumuyi, other top Nigerian pastors snub prophet’s death - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Popular pastors in Nigeria have until this moment, refused to react to the sudden death of their colleague in the 'kingdom assignment', Prophet Temitope Balogun Joshua. T.B Joshua, a leading pastor in Nigeria, and Africa including Asia, whose prowess in perfo…
